monitorHP.name: Monitor HP
monitorHP.hint: Tracks changes to a character's HP.

monitorXP.name: Monitor Experience Points
monitorXP.hint: Tracks changes in experience points on the character sheet.

monitorLevel.name: Monitor Level
monitorLevel.hint: Tracks level changes on the character sheet.

monitorSpellPrep.name: Monitor Spell Preparation
monitorSpellPrep.hint: Tracks when a character prepares or unprepares a spell.

monitorSpellSlots.name: Monitor Spell Slots
monitorSpellSlots.hint: Tracks changes to the number of spell slots on the character sheet.

monitorAC.name: Monitor Armor Class (AC)
monitorAC.hint: Tracks changes to a character's Armor Class (AC).

monitorAbility.name: Monitor Abilities
monitorAbility.hint: Tracks changes to a character's ability scores.

monitorSkillProficiency.name: Monitor Skill Proficiencies
monitorSkillProficiency.hint: Tracks changes to a character's skill proficiencies.

monitorSaveProficiency.name: Monitor Saving Throw Proficiencies
monitorSaveProficiency.hint: Tracks changes to a character's saving throw proficiencies.

monitorToolProficiency.name: Monitor Tool Proficiencies
monitorToolProficiency.hint: Tracks changes to a character's tool proficiencies.

monitorCurrency.name: Monitor Currency
monitorCurrency.hint: Tracks changes to currency on the character sheet.

monitorEffects.name: Monitor Active Effects
monitorEffects.hint: Tracks changes to active effects on the character sheet.

monitorItemQuantity.name: Monitor Item Quantities
monitorItemQuantity.hint: Tracks changes to the quantity of items a character has.

monitorItemNameDesc.name: Monitor Item Names and Descriptions
monitorItemNameDesc.hint: Tracks changes to item names and/or descriptions on the character sheet.

monitorItemEquip.name: Monitor Equipment
monitorItemEquip.hint: Tracks when a character equips or unequips an item.

monitorItemAttune.name: Monitor Attunement
monitorItemAttune.hint: Tracks when a character attunes to or loses attunement on an item.

monitorItemIdentify.name: Monitor Item Identification
monitorItemIdentify.hint: Tracks changes to an item's identified/unidentified status.

monitorItemCharges.name: Monitor Item Charges
monitorItemCharges.hint: Tracks changes to an item's charges on the character sheet.

monitorSheetMode.name: Monitor Sheet Mode
monitorSheetMode.hint: Tracks switching the character sheet between game and edit modes.

monitorInspiration.name: Monitor Inspiration
monitorInspiration.hint: Tracks changes to inspiration on the character sheet.

monitorDeathSave.name: Monitor Death Saves
monitorDeathSave.hint: Tracks changes to death saving throw results on the character sheet.
